subject: Re: [junit] Problem when installation of  a last version “junit4.9b2”!!
msgSnippet: Hi Emanuela, you have a problem in your CLASSPATH, in the name of your JAR file. You typed junit4.9b2.jar but it must be junit-4.9b2.jar . Once you fix this

Hi Emanuela,

you have a problem in your CLASSPATH, in the name of your JAR=
 file.
You typed "junit4.9b2.jar" but it must be "junit-4.9b2.jar".

Once y=
ou fix this in your CLASSPATH variable and restart all the command 
line co=
nsoles (in case you have any of them opened while you do the 
fix), you sho=
uld be up and running.

Bogdan
